description: '''Babacar Maurice Diop''', also known as '''Bu Baca Diop''' or '''Bu Baca''', is an Australian-based [[Senegal]]-born musician and is the front man of [[eponym]]ous bands. His music is Afro jazz and world jazz. The album, ''Stand'', was nominated for the 1995 [[ARIA Awards|ARIA Award]] for [[ARIA Award for Best World Music Album|Best World Music Album]].
